articles.title: How to Digitize Old Photos (We Compared Photo Scanning Apps and a Scanner) - WIRED
articles.description: Bring old memories back to life by digitizing your old photos. We tested three popular photo scanning apps against a scanner.
articles.content: With digital imagery we dont have to worry about limited shots, whether we put the film in correctly, or what will come back from the drugstore. The cloud holds all, ready to share on a screen near y… [+2293 chars]
